Additionally, the text mentions the health benefits of coloring.

However, the website is operated by Miniclip, an international digital games and entertainment company that develops, publishes, and distributes multiplayer mobile games. The company reaches over 400 million players each month and has recently acquired SYBO and its mobile game Subway Surfers. The text also highlights Miniclip's recent milestones, including exceeding four billion downloads and opening a new studio in Portugal.
